author: wilron
title: Another comfortable stay at the Blakely -
text:
This was not our first time at the Blakely and won't be the last.
Its location is great for many different nearby attractions. Its rooms are cozy and comfortable. Its lobby is tiny, but cheerful, especially during the December holidays. We were upgraded to a lovely suite and treated to extra pillows. Skipped the included breakfast to have brunch at Bistro Milano in the next block. Tip to hotel: love your marble bathroom & shower, except, for women trying to apply make-up, side sconces installed at eye level are so much more practical than a single overhead spot which only casts shadows on your face. that would be an easy update which pleases many guests.
